quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The requirement specifies transforming the person’s pose and expression into a cartoon line-art style. This involves checking whether the figure is simplified with clean lines and minimalistic details characteristic of cartoon art.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the person's pose and expression been simplified into a cartoon line-art style?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The edit instruction explicitly asks to maintain the raised hand gesture. This needs verification to ensure the hand remains in the same position.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the raised hand still present in the edited image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction mandates keeping the open mouth expression in the cartoon-like drawing. We must check if this detail was preserved during the simplification.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the cartoon-style person retain an open mouth expression?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The camera is an essential part of the original image. Ensuring it covers part of the face after the transformation confirms fidelity to the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the cartoon-style image include a camera covering part of the person's face?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Adding a speech bubble with specific text is a clear and straightforward instruction. We must verify the presence and content of the speech bubble.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a speech bubble with the text “Take a photo” in the edited image?
